post:
Looking for high performance KVM VPS? Our performance range of Cloud Servers feature NVMe SSD Disks and Intel E-2278G processors as standard; offering absolutely fantastic value for money and performance for high CPU/disk operations including Game Servers! What's not to love?
  
**P1 Package:**
1GB RAM | 15GB NVMe Disk | 1 CPU Core @ 3.4GHz+ | 2TB Monthly Bandwidth | 1 IPv4
$3.50 Monthly - [**ORDER HERE**](https://clouveo.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=19 "ORDER HERE")
         
**P2 Package:**
2GB RAM | 25GB NVMe Disk | 2 CPU Cores @ 3.4GHz+ | 3TB Monthly Bandwidth | 1IPv4
$5.00 Monthly - [**ORDER HERE**](https://clouveo.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=20 "ORDER HERE")
      
[**Click here to view all of our packages!**](https://clouveo.com/performancecloud "Click here to view all of our packages!")
 
**Features:**
* Intel E-2278G Processors, 3.4GHz+
* DDoS Protected
* KVM Virtualization
* Free Snapshots
* Automatic Backups
* VNC Console
* Recovery Mode
* Custom ISOs
* One Click Applications
       
**Looking Glass/Test IPs:**
[**Los Angeles, United States**](http://lg.lax.clouveo.com "Los Angeles, United States")
      
**FAQs**
_What payment methods do you accept?_
We accept payments via PayPal, Debit/Credit Card (Stripe) and Crypto via Coinify.
     
_What operating systems are offered?_
[Click here for a full list](https://clouveo.com/index.php/knowledgebase/15/What-operating-systems-are-available.html "Click here for a full list"). You can upload and run from a Custom ISO as well.
          
_Money back guarantee?_
All of our packages are backed by a 14 day money back guarantee.
     
_Can I upgrade/downgrade in future?_
It's possible to upgrade at any time from within our client area - Downgrading is not offered at this time.
  
_Is there an uptime guarantee?_
We truly believe in the reliability of our services - That's why we back them with a 99.9% uptime guarantee in line with our [Service Level Agreement](https://clouveo.com/index.php/knowledgebase/25/What-is-your-SLA.html "Service Level Agreement").
 

Want to know more? Contact our sales team [here](https://clouveo.com/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2 "here") or email us on sales@clouveo.com
